abstract.para: This section describes additional IBM and SUSE books and online documentation that can help you plan, install, customize and administer your system. If you do not find the references you need please submit a written comment to support@novell.com.

sect1.title: Appendix A - Contents of Starter System Distribution Archives

entry.para: A self-extracting copy of VMARC MODULE
A self-extracting copy of CMSDDR VMARC
The sample CP directory entry for the starter system in EBCDIC.
The sample CP directory entry for the starter system in ASCII.

This archive contains two disk images and a REXX script. The disk image NOV191 IMG contains the sample PROFILE EXEC, PROFILE XEDIT and NETWORK PARMS for the starter system. The disk image NOV19F IMG contains an IPLable kernel data, the sample virtual server CP directory entry, helpful CMS tools for building Linux virtual servers.
The bootable Linux image providing the installation functions and basic software for the FTP, HTTP, SMB and NFS servers.

sect1.title: Appendix E. Installation Script invmarc.exec
sect1.para: The script below does the installation of the images and the tools.

trace e ADDRESS COMMAND
say; say 'Accessing F00 as A' 'ACCESS F00 A'
